meanings: [명사] intention, aim, purpose, (formal) intent; (계획) plan, design, [동사] intend (to do / doing), aim (to do / for), design, mean (to do)

vlive.korean: 제가 단발머리를 고등학교 때 의도치 않게... I had to cut my hair short. 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🍯💧즈 왔어용~☔️
vlive.english: I had to cut my hair short.

vlive.korean: [의도치 않게 가장 열심히 한 일 : 매 순간 귀엽기] 그걸 언제 캐치했지? [Being adorable at every moment] When did you catch that? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) OFFLINE #11
vlive.english: [Being adorable at every moment] When did you catch that?

vlive.korean: [의도치 않은 후진 퍼포먼스] 나 후진으로 가는데? [Going backwards] I'm going backwards! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107

[진짜 포인트는 뒷면에] - 유리 씨 뒤에 이거 의도하신 건가요? - 뒤에도 포인트인가요? [The real accent is on the other side] - Did you do this on purpose? - Is that an accent at the back? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [DICON] 앙즈뽀짝 폴라로이드 꾸미기② (IZ*ONE)
vlive.english: [The real accent is on the other side] - Did you do this on purpose? - Is that an accent at the back?

vlive.korean: 의도하지 않았다고 - 의도하지 않았다고? Not planned? - Really? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : ♥SKZ2020 PARTY♥

examples.korean: His intent is clearly not to placate his critics. 발음듣기 그의 의도가 분명히 그의 비판자들을 달래려는 것은 아니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His intent is clearly not to placate his critics. 발음

examples.korean: He systematically abused his body with heroin and cocaine. 발음듣기 그는 헤로인과 코카인으로 자기 몸을 의도적으로 혹사했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He systematically abused his body with heroin and cocaine. 발음

examples.korean: The letter was deliberately couched in very vague terms. 발음듣기 그 편지는 의도적으로 대단히 애매한 말로 쓰여 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The letter was deliberately couched in very vague terms. 발음

examples.korean: She denies possessing the drug with intent to supply. 발음듣기 그녀는 공급할 의도로 그 약을 소지하고 있었다는 것을 부인한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She denies possessing the drug with intent to supply. 발음

examples.korean: He purposely tried to cultivate good relations with the press. 발음듣기 그는 언론과 좋은 관계를 구축하려고 의도적으로 노력했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He purposely tried to cultivate good relations with the press. 발음
